properties.areaDesc: Christian, MO; Webster, MO; Ozark, MO; Taney, MO; Douglas, MO; Wright, MO
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 10 at 6:04PM CST until January 10 at 6:45PM CST by NWS Springfield MO
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Western Ozark County in southwestern Missouri...
Southern Webster County in southwestern Missouri...
Western Douglas County in southwestern Missouri...
Southwestern Wright County in southwestern Missouri...
Eastern Christian County in southwestern Missouri...
Taney County in southwestern Missouri...

* Until 645 PM CST.

* At 604 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from near Rogersville to 7 miles southeast of
Highlandville to near Omaha, moving east at 30 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Branson...                        Lake Taneycomo...
Bull Shoals Lake...               Hollister...
Ava...                            Forsyth...
Seymour...                        Merriam Woods...
Sparta...                         Mansfield...
Kissee Mills...                   Rockaway Beach...
Hartville...                      Bull Creek...
Taneyville...                     Theodosia...
Kirbyville...                     Sundown...
Oldfield...                       Elkhead...
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for southwestern
Missouri.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.
